name: Hemingway Hider Dark
description: This is the Dark version of my other style Hemingway Hider. This style removes the logo and left sidebar and utilizes the extra space for more writing area and changes it to a darker style.
additional_info:
Release Date - 5/20/2017
---
Initial Features
- Removed logo
- Expanded writing area
- Removed left sidebar
- Changed stat text to white
- Changed suggested text with color highlight to gray to better readability
- Enforce white text in writing mode regardless of suggested changes
- Change inactive Write and Edit buttons more legible
- Removes padding of text toolbar (not shown in screenshot)
